verses.text: I am \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* of \add them that\add* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \add for me;\add* I am \w found|strong="H4672"\w* of \add them that\add* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* me \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold me, behold me, unto a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add that\add* was not \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

I have spread \w out|strong="H6566"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* unto a \w rebellious|strong="H5637"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add that was\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their own \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*;

A \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that provoketh me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* to my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*; that \w sacrificeth|strong="H2076"\w* in \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w*, and burneth \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* upon altars of \w brick|strong="H3843"\w*;\f + \fr 65.3 \ft upon…: Heb. upon bricks\f*

Which \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* among the \w graves|strong="H6913"\w*, and \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* in the \w monuments|strong="H5341"\w*, which \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w swine’s|strong="H2386"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and \w broth|strong="H4839"\w* of \w abominable|strong="H6292"\w* \add things is in\add* their \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*;\f + \fr 65.4 \ft broth: or, pieces\f*

Which \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Stand|strong="H7126"\w* by thyself, come not \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to me; for I am \w holier|strong="H6942"\w* than thou. These \add are\add* a \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* in my \w nose|strong="H0639"\w*, a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* that \w burneth|strong="H3344"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 65.5 \ft nose: or, anger\f*

Behold, \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me: I will not keep \w silence|strong="H2814"\w*, but will \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w*, even \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w* into their \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*,

Your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, and the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w blasphemed|strong="H2778"\w* me upon the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*: therefore will I \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* their \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w work|strong="H6468"\w* into their \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, As the new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* is \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w cluster|strong="H0811"\w*, and \add one\add* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it not; for a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \add is\add* in it: so will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for my \w servants’|strong="H5650"\w* sakes, that I may not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* them all.

And I will bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* out of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and out of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* an \w inheritor|strong="H3423"\w* of my \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: and mine \w elect|strong="H0972"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* it, and my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* there.

And \w Sharon|strong="H8289"\w* shall be a \w fold|strong="H5116"\w* of \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, and the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Achor|strong="H5911"\w* a place for the \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* to lie down \w in|strong="H7258"\w*, for my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that have \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* me.

¶ But ye \add are\add* they that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w forget|strong="H7913"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, that \w prepare|strong="H6186"\w* a \w table|strong="H7979"\w* for that \w troop|strong="H1409"\w*, and that \w furnish|strong="H4390"\w* the drink \w offering|strong="H4469"\w* unto that \w number|strong="H4507"\w*.\f + \fr 65.11 \ft troop: or, Gad\f*\f + \fr 65.11 \ft number: or, Meni, a pagan god\f*

Therefore will I \w number|strong="H4487"\w* you to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and ye shall all bow \w down|strong="H3766"\w* to the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*: because when I \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, ye did not \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*; when I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, ye did not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; but \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* before mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and did \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \add that\add* wherein I \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* not.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, Behold, my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, but ye shall be \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*: behold, my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, but ye shall be \w thirsty|strong="H6770"\w*: behold, my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, but ye shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*:

Behold, my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* for \w joy|strong="H2898"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, but ye shall \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* for \w sorrow|strong="H3511"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* for \w vexation|strong="H7667"\w* of \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.\f + \fr 65.14 \ft vexation: Heb. breaking\f*

And ye shall \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* your \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for a \w curse|strong="H7621"\w* unto my \w chosen|strong="H0972"\w*: for the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* shall \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* thee, and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* by \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:

That he who \w blesseth|strong="H1288"\w* himself in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* himself in the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0543"\w*; and he that \w sweareth|strong="H7650"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0543"\w*; because the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w* are \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*, and because they are \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* from mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

¶ For, behold, I \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* and a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* shall not be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*, nor \w come|strong="H5927"\w* into \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 65.17 \ft come…: Heb. come upon the heart\f*

But be ye \w glad|strong="H7797"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w* \add in that\add* which I \w create|strong="H1254"\w*: for, behold, I \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* a \w rejoicing|strong="H1525"\w*, and her \w people|strong="H5971"\w* a \w joy|strong="H4885"\w*.

And I will \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w joy|strong="H7797"\w* in my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* shall be no more \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in her, nor the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w crying|strong="H2201"\w*.

There shall be no more thence an \w infant|strong="H5764"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, nor an old \w man|strong="H2205"\w* that hath not \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* his \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: for the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*; but the \w sinner|strong="H2398"\w* \add being\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* shall be \w accursed|strong="H7043"\w*.

And they shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w* \add them;\add* and they shall \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of them.

They shall not \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w*; they shall not \w plant|strong="H5193"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: for as the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \add are\add* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and mine \w elect|strong="H0972"\w* shall long \w enjoy|strong="H1086"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 65.22 \ft shall long…: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out\f*

They shall not \w labour|strong="H3021"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7385"\w*, nor bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* for \w trouble|strong="H0928"\w*; for they \add are\add* the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and their \w offspring|strong="H6631"\w* with them.
And it shall come to pass, that before they \w call|strong="H7121"\w*, I will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*; and while they are yet \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, I will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

The \w wolf|strong="H2061"\w* and the \w lamb|strong="H2924"\w* shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w together|strong="H0259"\w*, and the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* like the \w bullock|strong="H1241"\w*: and \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w serpent’s|strong="H5175"\w* \w meat|strong="H3899"\w*. They shall not \w hurt|strong="H7489"\w* nor \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* in all my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
